text: my name is tobias bechtold and i'm the
practice manager for our swiss fsi
practice for professional services we
are helping our clients with their
journey to cloud so basically we help
them at the very beginning of their
journey on shaping their cloud strategy
and how to get started but we also
really help them with hands-on
migrating workloads for example to the
cloud looking into data and analytics
topics helping them to stay secure and
compliant and things around them so
basically i'm coming from a computer
engineering background
and at the early days of aws in 2006
i was already kind of observing what aws
were doing i was playing around a little
bit of it as part of my studies and then
when i heard
in 2020 that aws is coming to
switzerland and it's growing there i
really wanted to become part of this
journey and to work with our clients and
help them to achieve their business
needs and goals so being a builder at
aws for me means really that we always
have open eyes for unsolved customer
issues and challenges we always try to
see do we have a good solution for the
challenges of our customers and if we
find areas where the solutions we have
do not
meet the needs of our customers we build
something we develop a new solution we
keep an entrepreneurial mindset at aws
